summary: Allows you to change the complete pad-control
descriptionHtml:
Simple select the controlmap.txt and reconfigurate the pad-buttons
It is possible to combine two buttons (for example LB+A for QuickMap) and you can set a alternate button.

When you choose <Use PreDef>, you must set the []-Button under the alternate-button.
(See \"Inventroy\">\"Charge item\" for a example)

After saveing the controlmap.txt you should place this file to:
steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\\Interface\\Controls\\PC\\controlmap.txt
(If the folder doesn\'t exit, create it).

edit:
When you have problems:
Please delete the file steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\ControlMap_Custom.txt - it overwrites the settings from the controlmap.txt
author: GPI
